title: Lainey Wilson On Touring with Jason Aldean and About To Have Her First No. 1 + Scotty McCreery On Still Driving the Truck He Won’t on American Idol + Easy Trivia!
itunes:title: Lainey Wilson On Touring with Jason Aldean and About To Have Her First No. 1 + Scotty McCreery On Still Driving the Truck He Won’t on American Idol + Easy Trivia!
description:
Lainey Wilson stops by to talk about her song “Things A Man Oughta to Know”, touring with Jason Aldean and how much money she made performing as a Hannah Montana impersonator. Scotty McCreery stops by to perform a song from his new album, the truck he won on American Idol that he still drives. We also play a round of easy trivia and Amy’s Fun Fact Friday!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
